compatibility.notes: The radvd license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses, as they may impose additional obligations.

key_requirements: Include the license text in redistributions.
Obtain written permission for trademark use.
license.name: radvd
obligations: Must not redistribute versions specifically labelled as not for redistribution.
Must follow all terms of other applicable copyrights and licenses.
Redistributions of source code must retain copyright notice, conditions, and disclaimer.
Redistributions in binary form must reproduce copyright notice, conditions, and disclaimer in documentation.
Advertising materials must acknowledge the authors and contributors.
